thread.title: Link-Assistant.Coms Yauhen Khutarniuk to Speak at BrightonSEO Conference
thread.title_full: Link-Assistant.Coms Yauhen Khutarniuk to Speak at BrightonSEO Conference - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Link-Assistant.Coms Yauhen Khutarniuk to Speak at BrightonSEO Conference
text:
The speech to be delivered on September 18, 2015 is titled “Running SEO on a shoestring budget”; Link-Assistant.Com will also be exhibiting at BrightonSEO with their flagship product SEO PowerSuite.
Link-Assistant.Com , a global leader in developing internet marketing products, announced today that it will participate at BrightonSEO Conference , which will be held at Brighton Dome in Brighton, the UK. Link-Assistant.Com’s Head of SEO Yauhen Khutarniuk will speak at the conference on Friday, September 18, at 9.45 am GMT+1. The company will be also exhibiting at the show, so BrightonSEO delegates will be able to find out more about SEO software innovations at SEO PowerSuite’s booth.
BrightonSEO is the UK’s and world’s leading search marketing conference, which brings together some of the best speakers in the world of search. Held twice a year, in April and September, the event has grown to include 2000 participants, 57 speakers, 20 exhibiting brands and, according to the organizers, definitely the best crowd.
With over 9 years’ experience in SEO and internet marketing, Yauhen Khunarniuk is currently Link-Assistant.Com’s Head of SEO. At BrightonSEO, Yauhen will be presenting a speech “Running SEO on a shoestring budget,” and here’s how he comments on it: “Newbie SEOs are often confronted with the problem that all the SEO tips they get involve some budget spendings. But what if the SEO budget is limited, which is often the case with small businesses or startups? In my presentation, I’ll share best ways of doing SEO with little or no money spent.”
Slide deck of Yauhen Khutarniuk’s presentation is available at http://bit.ly/brighton_yk_2015 .
To get notified on the coming updates from Link-Assistant.Com, follow the company on Facebook fb.me/LinkAssistant, Twitter @LinkAssistant or Google Plus gplus.to/LinkAssistant.
About Link-Assistant.Com
Link-Assistant.Com is the maker of SEO PowerSuite - the all-in-one SEO software for search marketers, digital agencies and bloggers. SEO PowerSuite is a toolset made up of 4 individual tools – Rank Tracker, WebSite Auditor ( on-page optimization software ), SEO SpyGlass and LinkAssistant – delivering best results when combined. Link-Assistant.Com is a small and dedicated company that competes on software excellence and customer service. The company embraces the changing role of SEO in today’s digital marketing world and believes that brands will keep relying on accurate SEO data to succeed online.
 //www.prweb.com/releases/2015/09/prweb12958318.htm
